translation-wizard.internet-usage-note:
IMPORTANT NOTE

Bible translation modules are installed using your internet connection.
If you are located in a country where Christians are persecuted,
you should NOT use this software due to a risk of detection!
translation-wizard.repo-data-last-updated: Repository data was last updated on {{date}}.
translation-wizard.repo-selection-info-text:
Ezra Project works with Bible translation modules provided by the SWORD project and the CrossWire Bible Society.

Below you see the list of SWORD repositories published by CrossWire. A repository is an internet storage location that contains a set of Bible translation modules. Next to each repository you see the total number of Bible translation modules available from that repository.

To install a Bible translation module, select at least one repository from the list below. The CrossWire and eBible.org repositories are a good place to start.
translation-wizard.more-repo-information-needed:
You need more information about these repositories?
Have a look at the CrossWire Wiki.
translation-wizard.click-to-show-detailed-module-info: Click on a translation code (link after translation name) to show detailed module information here.
translation-wizard.updating-repository-data: Updating repository data! This will take a few seconds ...
translation-wizard.update-repository-data-failed: Updating repository data failed! Are you offline?
translation-wizard.pick-languages-from-repos: Please pick at least one of the languages available from the following repositories:
translation-wizard.it-takes-time-to-install-translation: Note that it takes some time for each translation to be downloaded and then installed.
translation-wizard.removal-takes-time: Note, that each removal takes some time.
translation-wizard.select-translations-to-be-removed:
Select the bible translations that you would like to remove.

Disabled entries in the list are translations not installed in the users directory.
translation-wizard.enter-unlock-key: {{moduleId}} is license protected. Please enter the unlock key!

module-sync.modules-with-db: SWORD modules with Ezra Project database!

general.new-release-available-body: A new release of Ezra Project is available!
general.module-install-failed: failed. Are you connected to the Internet?

help.help-text-no-tags-book-opened:
To start working with tags, create your first tag by clicking on the button New tag above.

After that you can browse the Bible text, click or drag-select verses and then assign the tag you just created.
help.help-text-no-tags-no-book-opened: To start working with tags, first select a Bible book to study.
help.help-text-translation-available: To start, select a book or a tag from the menu above.
help.help-text-no-translations:
To start, first install at least one Bible translation.

You can open the installation wizard by clicking on the settings icon and then Configure translations.

tags.really-delete: Do you really want to delete the following tag:
tags.tag-info-would-be-deleted: The tag information would be deleted for all associated verses!
tags.really-remove-tag-assignment: Do you really want to remove the tag "" from the selected verses?
tags.export-tagged-verse-list: Export tagged verse list to Word document
tags.title: Title

bible-browser.no-search-results: No results found when searching for
bible-browser.load-verse-context: Load the context of this verse
bible-browser.tag-hint: Click to show all verses with this tag
bible-browser.search-performance-hint: Only showing book list due to high number of search results. You can request the individual search results per book.
bible-browser.strongs-number-not-valid: This is not a valid Strong's number!

dictionary-info-box.help-instruction:
How to show Strong's here:

  1. First open a translation with the Strong's feature.
  2. While you press the SHIFT key you can move your mouse over the individual words and phrases to see Strong's infos here.
